original_title: 羞恥　新入生発育健康診断2018初夏
overview: It was an early summer day when the sun was very bright.  I was surprised at the examination venue that was on the bus. There were also boys at the venue.  I asked the teacher, "Are you naked in front of the boys?"  That's sexual harassment. That's not true, teacher ...  For boys like animals who are thinking about sex every day ... I can see important parts that I have never shown to my dad ...  I'm usually afraid of boys' eyes.  I feel like I'm staring at the inside of the skirt under the stairs ...
title: Shame This New Student Is Coming In For A Medical Checkup, And We Found Out She’s Still Growing! 2018 Early Summer
